name: 101 Spiders
description:
There are tokens to collect and spiders to shoot... you can go for the tokens to win the game, or you can skip tokens and just hunt Spiders. Why? Because we all like to win games... but we all hate spiders MORE! Big spiders. Mean spiders. All 101 Spiders! Kill Spiders, THEN collect Tokens... O.K. ... WIN - WIN

 OS _ PC (Windows 7 or higher)   MAC (OSX 10.7 or higher)                                                         GRAPHICS CARD _ 1GB or higher (DirectX-9 compatible  for Windows)                            AUDIO CARD _ Any (Optional) 

There are 10 Free Download Keys for evaluating our game available on our Web-site (FIRST COME/FIRST SERVE) - Visit www.wmgwgames.com , go to 'contact us' and send a message requesting one. Be sure to place your e-mail so we can reply with the key (If there are any left).   If you use one of these keys, please leave us a comment here telling us what you think. Thanks.... 

Problems or questions? Contact us at...  issues@wmgwgames.com
